newsitem.title: KENYA: Coffee prices steady at Kenyan auction.
newsitem.headline: Coffee prices steady at Kenyan auction.

text.p: Coffee prices were seen to be similar to last week at the weekly coffee auction on Tuesday.
Traders said premium grade AAs averaged $148 per 50-kg bag bag from $149.50 last week while grade ABs averages eased to $141 from 141.5 last week.
"The market appears to have become steady after recent advances," an auction official said.
The Coffee Board of Kenya said it sold all 22,493 bags it had on offer for sale compared to 21,792 bags sold last week.
